title: MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage | Awesome Arcade Hamster Home (White) | 18.11 x 11.61 x 21.26 Inch
descriptions:
Introducing the MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage in awesome white, also known as the Awesome Arcade Hamster Home! This spacious and fun-filled habitat is perfect for your small furry friend to enjoy.

The cage measures 18.11 inches in length, 11.61 inches in width, and 21.26 inches in height, making it a comfortable and roomy living space for your hamster. Weighing only 6.1 pounds, this white wonder is easy to handle and move around.

The MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage comes with a variety of accessories to keep your pet entertained and well-cared for. These include an exercise wheel, a water bottle, a food bowl, a nesting nook, and interior play tubes. Your hamster will love exploring the multi-level play space, burrowing in the deep base for bedding, and scurrying through the interior play tubes.

This hamster cage boasts a number of convenient features for both you and your pet. The top door allows for easy access, and the removable upper cover makes cleaning a breeze. The modular design, complete with connector pieces, allows for easy customization and compatibility with standard play tubes. Plus, with no tools required for assembly, setting up your hamster's new home is quick and hassle-free.

Your purchase is backed by a 1-year manufacturer's warranty, giving you peace of mind in your investment. With the MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage, you're not just buying a cage, you're creating a happy and engaging home for your beloved pet.
